about_the_game:
Gameplay: A combination of exploration, puzzle-solving, and moments of extreme tension. Players must investigate oppressive environments, search for clues, and make critical decisions that will impact the story’s progression. The gameplay is designed to maintain a balance between narrative and action.

Approximate Duration: This demo offers between 40 minutes to 1.5 hours of gameplay, depending on the player’s style and puzzle-solving skills.

Detailed Environments: Explore four unique locations filled with mystery, each crafted with high-quality graphics and an immersive atmosphere. From gloomy abandoned mansions to enigmatic fog-covered forests, every setting has its own story to tell.

Interactive Narrative: The game features a decision-making system that affects Susan’s relationships with other characters as well as the story’s outcome. How far will Susan go to save David?

Enemies and Threats: Face demonic entities and creatures that challenge your perception of reality. Use your wits and solve puzzles to escape their grasp, as direct confrontation isn’t always an option.

Immersive Sound Design: Each environment is accompanied by a haunting soundtrack and dynamic sound effects that heighten the sense of terror. Whispers in the dark and distant footsteps become part of your experience.

Available Languages: Full Spanish audio support and English subtitles and UI, offering an accessible experience for a wide audience.

Content Included in This Product:

  • A complete chapter centered on Susan, featuring 4 main locations.

  • A standalone story that complements the events of the Noroi E universe but can be enjoyed without prior knowledge of the other games.

  • Exploration mechanics, puzzle-solving, and branching narratives.

  • High-quality graphics and a dynamic lighting system to enhance the atmosphere of terror.

  • Unique enemies and threats specific to this chapter.

short_description: Noroi E: Susan's Memories is a psychological horror game where Susan, desperate to help her boyfriend David, discovers an ancient curse that forces him to control demonic entities. In her search for the truth, she will face horrors and decisions that will test her love and her sanity..
